trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is raised by the designer host for certain actions on a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>設計介面上的控制項上的特定動作的設計工具主應用程式就會引發事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> is handled by a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method, which takes a ViewEventArgs object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>由<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>委派採用 ViewEventArgs 物件做為參數的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>類別提供的預設委派處理<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Custom control designers override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> methods to process those events for the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 自訂控制項設計工具覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A>方法來處理這些事件的設計介面上的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: The designer host initializes a ViewEventArgs object for the type of action on the design surface, and then passes the object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具主初始化 ViewEventArgs 物件類型的設計介面上，動作，然後將物件傳遞給<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>委派。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> property represents the control designer region that the event applies to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A>屬性代表事件所套用的控制項設計工具區域。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property of the ViewEventArgs object indicates which type of action: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>ViewEventArgs 物件的屬性會指出哪一種動作:-<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: -A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: -A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property supplies the event arguments that are specific to the type of action.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>屬性提供事件引數所特有的動作類型。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the designer host initializes ViewEventArgs objects as follows: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object when you click a region.
trans-unit.target: 例如，設計工具主應用程式初始化 ViewEventArgs 物件，如下所示:-<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs>物件時按一下地區。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> object when a control is drawn on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: -A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>物件在設計介面上繪製控制項時。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> object when the template editing mode changes for the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: -A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs>物件範本編輯模式變更為設計介面上的控制項時。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For more information about events and delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關事件和委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs"></xref> class for the type of view event on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs"></xref>類別類型的設計介面上檢視事件。

trans-unit.source: The ViewEventArgs constructor is used by the designer host to initialize a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event.
trans-unit.target: ViewEventArgs 建構函式由設計工具主應用程式用來初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The designer host passes the initialized <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具主應用程式會傳遞初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>委派。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Typically, `region` is set for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> events, and `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，`region`設定<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>事件，以及`null`(`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 的<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>

trans-unit.source: The type of action that raised the event; used to initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType*>.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件; 的動作類型用來初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType*>

trans-unit.source: The designer region that the action applies to; used to initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region*>.
trans-unit.target: 此動作適用於; 設計工具區域用來初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region*>

trans-unit.source: The event arguments associated with `eventType`; used to initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs*>.
trans-unit.target: 與相關聯的事件引數`eventType`; 用於初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the event arguments that are associated with the action that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: 取得引發事件之動作相關聯的事件引數。

trans-unit.source: The EventArgs property supplies the event arguments that are specific to the type of action that is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: EventArgs 屬性提供事件引數所特有的中指定的動作類型<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, when you click a region, the designer host initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> as a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event, and then initializes the EventArgs property as a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當您按一下區域，設計工具主應用程式初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>為<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>事件，並再初始化 EventArgs 屬性，做為<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the designer host initializes the EventArgs property with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> event, or a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，設計工具主應用程式初始化 EventArgs 屬性與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>事件，或<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The EventArgs property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: EventArgs 屬性已由初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: An EventArgs that contains additional event data that is specific to the type of event.
trans-unit.target: 包含所特有的事件類型的其他事件資料的 EventArgs。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of action that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: 取得引發事件的動作類型。

trans-unit.source: The EventType property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object indicates which type of action raised the event: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: EventType 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>物件可指出哪一種動作引發的事件:-<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: -A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: -A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property supplies the event arguments that are specific to the type of action.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>屬性提供事件引數所特有的動作類型。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>

trans-unit.source: The EventType property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: EventType 屬性已由初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent"></xref> that specifies the type of action that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent"> </xref> ，指定引發事件的動作類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer region that the event applies to.
trans-unit.target: 取得事件所套用的設計工具區域。

trans-unit.source: The Region property represents the control designer region that the event applies to.
trans-unit.target: Region 屬性代表事件所套用的控制項設計工具區域。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Region property is set for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> events, and `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，區域屬性會設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>事件，以及`null`(`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 的<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>

trans-unit.source: The Region property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Region 屬性已由初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref> that the action applies to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"> </xref>要套用的動作。
